items.sentence: Tom always seems to be complaining about something.
Tom always seems to be there at the same time I am.
Tom always washes his hands before eating anything.
Tom and I are planning on visiting Boston together.
Tom and I go jogging together almost every morning.
Tom told me he was afraid that Mary might kill him.
Tom told me there was someone who wanted to see me.
Tom took off his helmet and wiped off his forehead.
Lie on the bench for a while with your eyes closed.
Many of the people in the crowd were wearing masks.
